e: ￹`Hacikay~ `ko~ `rakat~ `noya~ `'oner~.￺That snake moved quickly.￻那條蛇走的很快
￹`Aka~ `pi~`saraka~`rakat~.￺Don't walk back and forth all over the area.￻不要走來走去
￹`Pa~`rakat~`en~ `koya~ `tilid~.￺Cause that writing to move / i.e. See that that paper gets to its destination.￻把那封信寄出去
￹`O~ `mi~`ra~`rakatay~ `a~ `tamdaw~ `cingra~.￺He is a wanderer.￻他是流浪的人，他是無業遊民
